fields.name: ClientId
fields.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by client ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

fields.name: ObjectId
fields.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by object ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.

fields.name: ResourceId
fields.description: Specifies a user-assigned identity by ARM resource ID. For system-assigned, do not set this field.
